title: Strengthening Curriculum Development Practical Competencies: Online Course for Training Diabetes Foot Care Specialists

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational nursing knowledge and understanding of diabetes pathophysiology
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Accurately classify and explain the five stages of diabetic foot complications.
Perform appropriate prevention/intervention procedures in foot care practice scenarios with 80% accuracy.
Write case analysis reports through peer evaluation and feedback using online discussion boards.
Complete a diabetic foot assessment checklist with 100% accuracy via a smartphone learning module.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
